resources.string: "Click on the button below to scan and connect to UvRakshak bot close to you"
Select a bot from the list below
Timer will begin once you turn on Auto Mode
UV -C rays can be harmful if exposed to skin.Please make sure the robot is in an enclosed space and there are no humans present,before turning on the light
Looks like the battery has drained on your bot.Connect to a power source to recharge and resume disinfection

In Auto mode, the bot will continue to disinfect based on the time at the timer 


The motion sensors will be turned on and the bot will automatically shutdown if it detects human presence 


In AUTO mode you will not be able to move the bot around
